      • rolesHavePermission

        public abstract boolean rolesHavePermission(javax.jcr.Session userSession,
                          String absPath,
                          String[] actions,
                          Set<String> roles)
        Subclasses must override this method to determine permissions based on supplied roles.
        Parameters:
        userSession - the user session
        absPath - path to the object
        actions - requested action
        roles - effective roles for this request and content
        Returns:
        true if role has permission
